main_garuantee.text: All watches bought from the <Armenian Time> website come with a one-year (12 months) warranty starting from the purchase date. If there's an issue, you'll need to show a receipt filled and signed by the organization along with the watch. Please note that attempting to fix any problems before bringing it to our attention voids the warranty, and we won't be able to provide free warranty service in such cases.

main_deliveryTerms.title: Delivery Items
main_deliveryTerms.delivery_for_erevan_text: Yerevan deliveries guarantee fast service, reaching you on the next working day post-order registration, with convenient time slots between 12:00-18:00 or 18:00-23:00. Enjoy complimentary shipping for watches, while watch bands and accessories incur a nominal AMD 500 fee for orders below AMD 10,000.
main_deliveryTerms.delivery_for_erevan_return_text: For returns in Yerevan, if you opt for an immediate return upon delivery, there’s no additional charge. Should you decide later, post-courier departure, a return can be arranged by contacting the provided phone numbers in the “Contact Us” section, with a return fee of AMD 500.
main_deliveryTerms.delivery_for_region_text: Region-specific delivery is facilitated by the esteemed <<Hay Post>> company, ensuring a swift 1-3 working day delivery window. Payment is conveniently made on-site at the designated Armenian Post department upon parcel receipt.
main_deliveryTerms.delivery_for_region_return_text: For returns within regions, the process is seamless through Hay Post. Simply send the parcel back, and upon its receipt, we'll promptly refund your online payment (via card transfer, Idram, etc.). Please note a return fee of AMD 500 applies.

main_aboutUs.title: About Us
main_aboutUs.desc: Established in 2020, Armenian Time is a thriving watch brand, actively engaged in the meticulous design, production, and assembly of timepieces. With a dedicated focus on branding and pricing, the brand stands out by offering customers uniquely stylish Armenian brandy watches unparalleled in the market.Having secured registration with the RA Intellectual Property Agency, Armenian Time ensures the exclusivity of its timepieces, providing customers with the assurance that their purchase is genuinely one-of-a-kind.The exquisite and distinctive packaging of each model not only enhances their aesthetic appeal but also positions them as an ideal choice for both personal use and thoughtful gifts. Discover and acquire these exceptional timepieces conveniently through the official Armenian Time website, where a range of beautiful and distinctive models are displayed and available for purchase.
